MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: CHM Decompiler Save Convert Page HTML MHT
English.Char_Desc_45: Decompile CHM files, save page as html/mht.
English.Char_Desc_80: A program that can decompile CHM files and save current page as HTML/MHT file.
English.Char_Desc_250: NorthBright CHM Tool is a simple tool to decompile(extract) CHM files and extract the current page of a currently open CHM file and save it to HTML, MHT or Text format.
English.Char_Desc_450: NorthBright CHM Tool is a simple tool to decompile(extract) CHM files. You can either decompile an entire file by selecting the CHM file and extracting the content into a folder of your choice, or you can extract the current page of a currently open CHM file and save it to HTML, MHT or Text format.
English.Char_Desc_2000: NorthBright CHM Tool is a simple tool to decompile(extract) CHM files. You can either decompile an entire file by selecting the CHM file and extracting the content into a folder of your choice, or you can extract the current page of a currently open CHM file and save it to HTML, MHT or Text format. Features: 1. Large size CHM files supported. 2. Save current page in currently open CHM File as HTML/MHT file.
